subject: Migrating JMock parameterized tests from Junit 3.8.1 to 4.5
msgSnippet: Hi, I have some JMock tests that are using JUnit 3.8.1-style parameterization. I am currently at a loss how to migrate them, other than implementing my own
messageBody:
Hi,

I have some JMock tests that are using JUnit 3.8.1-style
parameterization. I am currently at a loss how to migrate them, other
than implementing my own runner.

JMock when used under JUnit 4.x uses @RunWith, and so does JUnit 4.x
Parameterized tests. It doesn't look like I can mix the two.

What am I missing?

Cheers,

James
